## MathUtils.radToDeg variable

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use \[\[THREE.MathUtils.radToDeg\]\] instead.
> 

Converts an angle measured in radians to an equivalent value in degrees.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
radToDeg: typeof THREE.MathUtils.radToDeg
```
